intro.title: Trainer Rerun Guide
description: This guide mainly uses Mamoswine instead of Cloyster. Why would you want to use Mamoswine instead?
Mamoswine doesn’t need a Choice item, so it can still attack after being affected by Cursed Body.
It also doesn’t take damage during a Sandstorm.
Thanks to Oblivious, Intimidate doesn’t work on it, so its stats can’t be reduced.
This guide mainly focuses on doing the run with two Mamoswines.
It’s possible to complete the run with just one Mamoswine, but in that case, you’ll need to heal instead of switching.
However, I recommend using two for a smoother run.

requirements.title: Requirements
items: Get x2 Mamoswines like this one (picture below) with item Loaded dice on both of them. They don't need 31iv in speed, just 31iv in attack with an attack nature.
Icicle Spear is a TM and you buy it at most regions Shopping Mall for $15000 or the GTL. PP Max Icicle Spear on both Mamoswines
Rock Climb (Ocarina or Pokemon if you choice not to put in on Mamoswine)
Optional depends on speed of the run: Defog (ocarina or pokemon)

tips_tricks.title: Some tips/tricks
items: The speed of the route depends on if you have a pokemon with you to exp level
Nickname the Mamoswines so it's easier to tell if you've switched them correctly
Holding Ctrl+A button for faster battles
You could do Morimoto and Cynthia first. Here is a quick guide on it https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sTgP_I-vImE

routes.name: Route 9 Shopping Mall
notes: Start from the Shopping Mall in Route 7 next to Opelucid City
Use Amulet coin/charm before fighting the trainer on top and work your way down

routes.name: Route 13
notes: Fly to Undella Bay
Go up to Route 13

routes.name: Route 214
notes: Fly to Veilstone City
go South all the way till you reach Route 214, continue South until you meet the trainer.

routes.name: Route 222
notes: Fly to Sunyshore City
go West all the way till you reach Route 222, continue West all the way till you meet the trainer.

routes.name: Route 210
notes: Fly to Solaceon Town
Proceed North all the way till you meet the Double Battle Trainers.
Use Icicle Spear

routes.name: Route 205
notes: Fly to Floaroma Town
go east Use a Max Repel before grass patch.

routes.name: Route 225
notes: Fly to Survival Area
Proceed East all the way, Rock Climb up and fight the trainer.

routes.name: SWITCH/HEAL Mamoswine
notes: Only heal if you're using 1 Mamoswine.
Fly back to Survival Area

routes.name: Route 226
notes: From the Survival Area go west.
The 2nd trainer (red circle) has a Miltank which needs Earthquake

routes.name: Route 206/207
notes: Fly to Oreburgh City
go north

routes.name: Heal
notes: Fly to Snowpoint City

routes.name: Snowpoint Gym
notes: Go to the Snowpoint City Gym.
The 2nd Trainer (in red) has a Glalie which needs Earthquake only in snow. Superpower on Pelipper if the Icicle Spear is disabled (Gengar cursed body chance).
The 4th Trainer (in blue) has a Slowbro which needs Earthquake.

routes.name: SWITCH/HEAL Mamoswine
notes: Only heal if you're using 1 Mamoswine.
Fly to Hearthome

routes.name: Sinnoh Route 212
notes: Go South from Hearthome all the way till you reach Route 212, continue South meet 2 trainers, then go Northeast and meet 2 trainers.
Use Earthquake on all mons, trainer marked in red

routes.name: Heal
notes: Fly to Resort Area

routes.name: Route 227/228/229
notes: Go North and meet 2 Trainers, proceed Northwest.
Use a max repel

routes.name: Route 227/228/229 (continued)
notes: Go North and you will meet 1 Trainer, continue North and meet 2 trainers, continue Northwest and meet another trainer, and 1 more trainer further up. Go West after the last Trainer
Skip the orange trainer.
Red 1 -> Earthquake on Poliwrath, Empoleon.
Red 2 -> Earthquake on Torkoal.
Red 3 -> Earthquake on Empoleon (Care Gengar cursed body chance).

routes.name: Route 227
notes: Go West till you reach Route 227,continue Northeast then Hop West on the platform till you meet the 2 trainers.

routes.name: If you still time left here are more trainers
SWITCH/HEAL Mamoswine
notes: Only heal if you're using 1 Mamoswine.

routes.name: Route 215
notes: Fly to Veilstone City
Go west to route 215 to fight the two firsts trainers

routes.name: Route 210
notes: needs defog
Fly to Celestic Town
Go east to route 210
Use defog and fight the first trainer, skip the second and the third, fight the fourth, do the double battle, fight the fifth.

source: I would not have been able to make this without all the info and resources put out there.
Trainer Rerun Mamoswine - Guide Tavern - PokeMMO
